      public Sniper(float fltWorldX, float fltWorldY, float fltWidth, float fltHeight, ObjectId id, ObjectHandler handler, SuperSocketMaster ssm, InputHandler input, int intPosition)
      Constructor for the Sniper
      Parameters:
      fltWorldX - - float value for the X position of the Sniper
      fltWorldY - - float value for the Y position of the Sniper
      fltWidth - - float value for the width of the Sniper
      fltHeight - - float value for the height of the Sniper
      id - - ObjectId value, the id of the object
      handler - - handler value, which list is it a part of
      ssm - - the ssm of the players
      input - - the input list of keys
      intPosition - - float value for the width of the Sniper
